docs.title: Unicorn Docs
docs.text: Documentation for the Unicorn Game Engine

docs.title: Functions
docs.text: Name Description AddUniqueToVector  Adds element to the back of the vector   TRUE if value was not already in the vector. EraseItemFromVector  Removes item from a vector   TRUE if item was found and removed FALSE if item was not found in the vector  StartMemoryTracking  Keeps track of memory allocations and deallocations when compiled with _DEBUG (normally defined in Debug).

docs.title: AddUniqueToVector
docs.text:
template<typename T> inline bool AddUniqueToVector(Vector<T>& Vector, T& Item)

Adds element to the back of the vector TRUE if value was not already in the vector. FALSE if value already exists

docs.title: EraseItemFromVector
docs.text:
template<typename T> inline bool EraseItemFromVector(Vector<T>& Vector, T& Item)

Removes item from a vector TRUE if item was found and removed FALSE if item was not found in the vector

docs.title: StartMemoryTracking
docs.text:
void StartMemoryTracking(const MemoryTrackingSettings& trackingSettings)

Keeps track of memory allocations and deallocations when compiled with _DEBUG (normally defined in Debug). By default only leaks are tracked and stack traces are not stored.

docs.title: EditorWindow
docs.text: class EditorWindow

docs.title: Variables
docs.text: Name Description mWindowDisplayName  Can be set in the windows constructor or Init functions.

docs.title: mWindowDisplayName
docs.text:
String mWindowDisplayName

Can be set in the windows constructor or Init functions. If no name is set then EditorWindowManager will set a name based on the class name.

docs.title: MemoryTrackingSettings
docs.text: struct MemoryTrackingSettings

docs.title: Variables
docs.text: Name Description myShouldStoreStackTraces  Enables storage of stack traces for all allocations. myShouldTrackAllAllocations  Enables tracking of all allocations, not just leaks.

docs.title: myShouldStoreStackTraces
docs.text:
bool myShouldStoreStackTraces

Enables storage of stack traces for all allocations. This comes at a significant performance cost, but makes it easier to track down memory leaks

docs.title: myShouldTrackAllAllocations
docs.text:
bool myShouldTrackAllAllocations

Enables tracking of all allocations, not just leaks. Prints a summary of top allocation stack traces if myShouldStoreStackTraces is enabled.
